details: Of use in intermittent fever, with weariness and inclination to stretch. Hamstrings feel too short. (AMMON. MUR.) Flexors mostly affected. Sensation of retraction of arm tendons. Stretching.

Head: Violent headache, caused by drinking
Great rage; vehement at beginning of chilly stage
Would like to tear everything to pieces
Pain under right frontal bone
Fever: Sensation as of wind blowing on knees
PAINS IN ALL JOINTS, AS IF TENDONS WERE TOO SHORT, especially knee-joints
Thirst during apyrexia, but little during chilly stage; still less during hot stage, and none during sweating
Constipation, faeces dry and in small balls  and hard
Female: Shooting pain from vagina up towards left ovary

name: Cimex
